resources.string: The Aula at the Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science is the largest room in the Faculty. It can accommodate over 300 students simultaneously and is designed for a variety of purposes, including lectures, special events, informational speeches, and examinations.

The Aula at the Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science is the largest and most iconic room in the Faculty. Known for its architectural elegance and state-of-the-art facilities, it can accommodate over 300 students simultaneously. The Aula is designed to serve multiple purposes, making it a versatile space that supports both academic and ceremonial events. It hosts a range of activities, from engaging lectures and inspiring speeches to informative workshops, networking events, and comprehensive examinations. With advanced audio-visual equipment and comfortable seating arrangements, the Aula offers an optimal environment for learning, discussion, and celebration.
